PHRASE.LANG: Avatares de animales - Gran Felino - Pack

Transform your avatar into Big Cat themed Animal Avatars with these locomotion objects.
 
 These locomotion objects will boost your speed.
 
 Speed:
 ・Standard = 5.25m/s
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Animal Avatars - Big Cat - Lion
 (2) Animal Avatars - Big Cat - Cheetah
 (3) Animal Avatars - Big Cat - Cougar
 
 ※These items are portable items. [#Legal]
